channel.title: Help with membership on my server
channel.description: hey everytime if i try to wear a fury or do taste veng it says u need to be a mem to do that can someone tell me how to change this or how make someone member ...........thnx

item.title: Help with membership on my server
item.dc:creator: @humza-ali humza-ali
item.description:
@humza-ali wrote:

on your source files go to character files and it should is ismember 0 change it to 1
if thats not it i think you should check one the the other files where all the names of people are i think its called (data) sorry i dont know atm coz i aint got a source on my laptop…
and u can go to client.java press ctrl + f at the same time and look for givemem or makemem and see if anything is wrong…

Read full topic
item.source: Help with membership on my server
